long_description: K2 Cassette snowboard bindings spotlight personalized fit and function in a smooth and responsive package. Braving the trees or conquering the park, these bindings just want to have fun. Flare-frame asymmetric highbacks follow a woman's natural leg contours, provide great heel-side response and have a forgiving side-to-side flex; EVA calf pads add comfort. A-Line chassis feature a lightweight, 1-piece design with fiberglass-reinforced nylon; Cassette bindings feature a women-specific, dialed-in flex. Baseplates feature seamless EVA covers with polycarbonate support frames that prevent snow buildup. Tool-free power ramps adjust toe-side response. Caddi ankle traps feature a 3D shape with a narrow waist and thin construction for free-flexing mobility; durable EVA padding cushions the fit. Cored toe straps save weight and provide a super-snug fit over the toes of your boots; straps offer easy, tool-free centering adjustment. Lightweight Speed Ratchets feature an easy-feeding tapered ladder opening for fast entry; hinged mounts move the ankle straps away from the bindings for clean entry and exit. Cassette bindings feature a laid-back forward lean; increased range of adjustment offers many angles to choose from.
short_description: K2 Cassette snowboard bindings spotlight personalized fit and function in a smooth and responsive package. Braving the trees or conquering the park, these bindings just want to have fun.
